Academy.title: Beije Talent Academy
Academy.page_description: Corsi specializzati Frontend & Backend per diventare Software Developer. Svilupperai le tue competenze attraverso lezioni frontali, esercitazioni, valutazioni e progetti reali.
Academy.send_to_youtube: Come find us on Youtube: you will find the digital pills of our Frontend  &  Backend experts, the Webinars and much more… We are waiting for you!
Academy.paragraph1_carousel_student: Consider that the contents of the course are in line with the stated goals.
Academy.paragraph2_carousel_student: Considers the teacher prepared and competent in relation to the proposed contents.

comments_txt.comments1: Nell'Academy FrontEnd di Beije ho approfondito tecnologie e nozioni nuove, mi è stato inoltre fornito supporto per entrare nel mondo del lavoro, cosa che la sola università non mi ha fornito, per questo lo reputo un percorso che rifarei volentieri.
comments_txt.comments2: Beije mi ha da subito dato un'ottima impressione e non si è smentita con il tempo. Ho avuto un contratto a tempo indeterminato dopo un breve periodo di formazione e sono entrato in un team che mi ha accolto ben oltre le mie aspettative.
comments_txt.comments3: Beije Academy è stata un’esperienza costruttiva e stimolante: mi ha permesso di apprendere le tecnologie usate nel mondo lavorativo e mi ha incoraggiato a mettermi in gioco in ogni circostanza.
comments_txt.comments4: Nonostante fosse la prima Academy tutta da remoto è stata gestita ottimamente, sia nelle lezioni frontali che nella divisione dei gruppi in mini-progetti. Ritengo che l'Academy mi abbia fornito una preparazione più che adeguata per svolgere attività in ambito Java.
comments_txt.comments5: Una formazione completa, un'esperienza professionalizzante che ti lascia con delle competenze reali e applicabili nell'immediato. Alla Beije Talent Academy non si impara solo a programmare, ma a farlo con consapevolezza e ingegno.
comments_txt.comments6: Beije Accademy mi è stata molto utile per introdurmi nel mondo del lavoro con sicurezza grazie alle simulazioni in team, dove ho potuto mettere in pratica ciò che ho studiato in Accademy ed in Università.
comments_txt.comments7: L’Academy di Beije è stata un’esperienza formativa davvero importante per il mio percorso di crescita. Non credevo che in soli tre mesi sarei riuscito ad apprendere tanto da poter lavorare in autonomia su progetti complessi. Sicuramente la consiglierei a tutti!
comments_txt.comments8: Grazie all'Academy Java di Beije ho capito quello che differenzia l'università dal mondo del lavoro e soprattutto ho capito come gestire un progetto vero e proprio, capendo come usare le tecnologie java piu usate dalle aziende.

introList.el2: Constant training through individual and group projects
introList.el3: Use of the technologies most requested by the market

section1.title: Java Basis and theory
section1.subsection1: Fundamentals of Java and object-oriented programming
section1.subsection2: Variables: difference between primitive types and object references
section1.subsection3: Operators in Java: arithmetic, unary and binary
section1.subsection4: Conditional and iterative constructs; advanced flow control
section1.subsection5: The String class and the concept of immutability
section1.subsection6: The StringBuilder class and the concept of “equality” between objects in Java
section1.subsection7: Mono and multidimensional arrays in Java; the ArrayList class
section1.subsection8: The management of date and time in Java
section1.subsection9: Method design: access modifiers and parameter passing
section1.subsection10: The “Constructors” methods and overloading of methods in a class
section1.subsection14: Hints of functional programming in Java: writing simple Lambda functions
section1.subsection15: The Design Patterns: Builder, Factory, Singleton and Decorator

section2.title: Java I/O
section2.subsection1: Read and write files in Java
section2.subsection3: The XML format and how to handle it in Java
section2.subsection4: Import and export data from different sources and formats

section3.title: Java & database
section3.subsection3: Interface to a database with JDBC
section3.subsection5: The Hibernate framework for ORM and JPA

section4.title: Java for the web
section4.subsection1: Java for the Web: Servlets and JSPs, HTML and CSS
section4.subsection2: The concept of session and the use of beans for the maintenance and transport of data
section4.subsection4: The Spring: Inversion of Control & Dependencies Injection framework
section4.subsection5: SpringMVC: DispatcherServlet, controller, model and views
section4.subsection7: Web Service SOAP: implementation of a server and a client
section4.subsection8: Web Service REST: the JSON format and implementation of a WS REST with SpringMVC
section4.subsection10: AJAX: Using the fetch command for asynchronous calls

history_desc.part1: At the heart of the Beije model is a
history_desc.part3: vision: people at the center for  a valuable company. From an ideal to a business: for more than 10 years we are constantly committed to update our know-how and we are able to provide the most advanced methodologies and the most innovative technologies for the realization of highly specialized projects.

mission_desc.part1: We help companies to implement innovative projects through

Up.title: Up
Up.desc1: We work with our customers to offer design, implementation, delivery, integration and application maintenance services for software systems. We support and implement projects starting from frontend / backend technical analysis, mockup creation to software implementation through the innovative technologies available on the market.
Up.desc2: Through the Agile method, verification and update steps of the product are defined already during development, with frequent releases of versions that can be tested by the customer, in order to optimize improvements or any changes on the agreed activities. From the analysis of the project to the drafting of the documentation up to the implementation: we follow you in every phase.
Up.paragraph: The technologies used are Java and .Net for the Backend and Javascript and the main frameworks for the Frontend (React, Angular and Vue). For the infrastructure, we usually base cloud projects on Amazon Web Services.
